text: Baron was a Japanese general and politician. He was an admiral in the Imperial Japanese Navy. He was the final leader of the Imperial Rule Assistance Association and Prime Minister of Japan from 7 April to 17 August 1945. ==Others websites== *Annotated bibliography for Suzuki Kantarō from the Alsos Digital Library for Nuclear Issues * *Suzuki Kantarō and Pacific War at 1945 Category:1868 births Category:1948 deaths Category:Former dictators Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:Japanese admirals Category:Politicians from Chiba Prefecture Category:Foreign ministers of Japan
title: Kantarō Suzuki
